name: TERRESTRIAL
overview: Psytronik Software in association with ICON64 present TERRESTRIAL! A multi-part C64 sci-fi action adventure featuring 9 different mini-games combined into one epic arcade adventure! Take on the role of CAPTAIN HAVOC as he battles against the invading alien hordes! Returning from a routine patrol on the outer edge of the solar system Captain Havoc receives an urgent communication from Moon Base Ceti. Homeworld is under attack from an unknown alien force! As the only ship in range it's up to Captain Havoc to investigate. ** STAGES ** STAGE 1: Board and launch your attack craft. STAGE 2: Man the assault cannons and take out the approaching enemy fleet. STAGE 3: Travel to an occupied city via the canyon. Take out protector ships. STAGE 4: City battle - engage enemy units. Clear all structures to secure landing zone. STAGE 5: Tank battle. Traverse landscapes & destroy enemy shield generators. STAGE 6: Battle the enemy guardians in a thrilling laser-disc battle! STAGE 7: Defeat the alien brain! ** FEATURES ** · Several different gameplay styles · Detailed graphics & animation · 3D canyon battle! · Parallaxed scrolling tank levels · PAL and NTSC compatible · TheC64 Mini + Maxi compatible
